title: Meaning of Life
verses: Ecclesiastes 12:13 (WEB) — "This is the end of the matter. All has been heard. Fear God, and keep his commandments; for this is the whole duty of man."
Micah 6:8 (WEB) — "He has shown you, man, what is good. What does Yahweh require of you, but to act justly, to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God?"
Matthew 22:37-39 (WEB) — "He said to him, “You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your mind… and… You shall love your neighbor as yourself.”"
John 17:3 (WEB) — "This is eternal life: that they should know you, the only true God, and him whom you sent, Jesus Christ."
Ephesians 2:10 (WEB) — "For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared before that we would walk in them."
body: We were made to know God, to love Him and our neighbor, and to walk in the good works He prepared. Reverence leads to love; love leads to mission; mission returns to worship.
prayer: Eternal God, teach me to number my days and to live them in love for You and others. Show me the good works You prepared and help me walk in them with joy. Amen.
